parameters.gain: a numeric vector of average body weight gain
parameters.dose: a numeric vector of methionine dose
parameters.product: a factor with levels control, DLM and MHA denoting the treatments

title: Weight gain for different methionine sources
description:
Description
Data consist of average body weight gain of chickens being treated 
with one of the two methionine sources DLM and HMTBA.
reference:
The dataset contains a common control measurement for the two treatments. More examples using this
dataset are found under AR.2 and MM.2.
format: A data frame with 9 observations on the following 3 variables:
